tool_description: SmileMe's Captcha provide a Captcha image for you. Just call and the API will return the info Captcha ( include image base64, id, value ...)
name: Captcha_v2
title: Captcha

api_list.name: getErrors
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get a list of available error codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://captcha9.p.rapidapi.com/api/captcha/errors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "captcha9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Calculation captcha
api_list.description: - Provide info captcha for website to prevent auto request.
api_list.code:

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://captcha9.p.rapidapi.com/api/captcha/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: Number  captcha
api_list.description:
Captcha code is number format.

- params: length is number (from 1 to  8, default is 6)

api_list.name: String captcha
api_list.description:
captcha code is string format.

- params: length is number (from 1 to 8, default is 6)

api_list.name: Custom captcha
api_list.description:
captcha code is user format. 

- string is number or character, string length is up to 8 (from 1 to 8)
